pullrequest.title: update most tests to work without installing

content.raw:
CI:

* [jenkins trusty no-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/370/) looks fine

but let me take a moment to say this is amazing; listen up @\_jrivero_

* the [jenkins homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/275/) build has 19 fixed tests! We have been having a [problem with any tests involving plugins on OS X in our jenkins builds](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/issue/25/homebrew-problem-with-protobuf-and-plugins), but this appears to fix it!
content.html:
CI:

  • jenkins trusty no-gpu looks fine

but let me take a moment to say this is amazing; listen up @_jrivero_

  • the jenkins homebrew build has 19 fixed tests! We have been having a problem with any tests involving plugins on OS X in our jenkins builds, but this appears to fix it!
